title: first riven game against new aatrox

replies.body:
https://i.imgur.com/59ESR9Z.png[/img]

Why play Riven when you can play Riven 2.0

> [{quoted}](name=Fervor,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EJTNTvBN,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-07-08T19:14:45.495+0000)
>
> https://i.imgur.com/59ESR9Z.png[/img]
> 
> Why play Riven when you can play Riven 2.0

Pretty sure Riven beats Riven 2,0 in a 1v1 :p
It's not even hard either. Just dodge shit early and all in at 6. Easy lane. (also him reviving doest matter since if you kill him fast he receives with no HP)
You sure have hard-on for Stormrazor
Riven shits on Aatrox I'm pretty sure. I haven't seen the matchup, but based off my knowledge and experience with their kits. I definitely see Riven destroying Aatrox.
He counters her execute with his revive and has CC to disrupt her combos and flow. I feel like Aatrox would win, especially with his passive countering her shield and any life steal.
Riven should be too mobile for him to hit his CC
Aatrox is stronger than Riven in laning phase but after that Riven can do it to him.
Iâ€™ve won every time against Aatrox as riven, but it was super annoying. His cc was super annoying, but you can just e away from most of his abilities.

And the first time he uses his Q against you

https://coubsecure-s.akamaihd.net/get/b201/p/coub/simple/cw_timeline_pic/cf409dcce28/685150924b544edd22ec7/med_1525911054_image.jpg

I personally feel like new Aatrox is cooler than Aatrox but isn't better. Aatrox was basically a flavor of Master Yi that I preferred to play. And now he's gone. Maybe Master Yi will get deleted from the game too, but until that happens, it doesn't really feel fair.
depends on if you can harras and poke her. I just wish aatrox q was quicker
